greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Inverse permutation to A278511.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (define (A278512 n) (if (= 1 n) n (let ((row (A278538 n)) (col (A278537 n))) (+ 1 (* (/ 1 2) (- (expt (+ row col) 2) row col col col -2))))))
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 23 2016
